targets.queryText:
SELECT
s.start_timestamp AS "Started",
s.end_timestamp AS  "Ended",
CASE WHEN s.successful = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS "Successful",
e.simulation_period_start AS "Simulation Start Timestep",
e.simulation_period_end AS "Simulation End Timestep",
MAX(timestep) AS "Timesteps",
MAX(t.episode) + 1 AS "Episodes",
MIN(a.seed) AS "Seed",
CASE WHEN e.central_agent = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS "Central Agent",
MIN(a.name) AS "Agent",
MIN(a.reward_style) AS "Reward"
FROM simulation s
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.simulation_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN building b ON b.environment_id = e.id
LEFT JOIN agent a ON b.agent_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN timestep t ON t.environment_id = e.id
WHERE s.id = ${simulation_id}
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
s.start_timestamp AS "Started",
s.end_timestamp AS  "Ended",
CASE WHEN s.successful = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS "Successful",
e.simulation_period_start AS "Simulation Start Timestep",
e.simulation_period_end AS "Simulation End Timestep",
MAX(timestep) AS "Timesteps",
MAX(t.episode) + 1 AS "Episodes",
MIN(a.seed) AS "Seed",
CASE WHEN e.central_agent = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS "Central Agent",
MIN(a.name) AS "Agent",
MIN(a.reward_style) AS "Reward"
FROM simulation s
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.simulation_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN building b ON b.environment_id = e.id
LEFT JOIN agent a ON b.agent_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN timestep t ON t.environment_id = e.id
WHERE s.id = ${simulation_id}

targets.queryText:
SELECT
(t.timestep + ${timezone_offset})*3600 AS timestamp,
w.outdoor_drybulb_temperature
FROM weather_timeseries w
LEFT JOIN timestep t ON t.id = w.timestep_id
LEFT JOIN environment_timeseries s ON s.timestep_id = w.timestep_id
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = s.environment_id
WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}

SELECT
(t.timestep + ${timezone_offset})*3600 AS timestamp,
w.outdoor_drybulb_temperature

LEFT JOIN environment_timeseries s ON s.timestep_id = w.timestep_id
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = s.environment_id
WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}

targets.queryText:
WITH c_union AS (
SELECT *, 1 AS label FROM ramping_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 2 AS label FROM load_factor_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 3 AS label FROM average_daily_peak_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 4 AS label FROM annual_peak_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 5 AS label FROM net_electric_consumption_cost_function
)

SELECT
(s.timestep + ${timezone_offset})*3600 AS timestamp,
AVG(s.value/b.value) AS basic,
AVG(s.value/o.value) AS optimized
FROM c_union s
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = s.environment_id
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT * FROM c_union WHERE environment_id = ${basic_rbc_environment_id}
) b ON b.timestep = s.timestep AND b.label = s.label
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT * FROM c_union WHERE environment_id = ${optimized_rbc_environment_id}
) o ON o.timestep = s.timestep AND o.label = s.label
WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}
GROUP BY
s.timestep,
s.environment_id
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH c_union AS (
SELECT *, 1 AS label FROM ramping_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 2 AS label FROM load_factor_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 3 AS label FROM average_daily_peak_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 4 AS label FROM annual_peak_cost_function
UNION ALL
SELECT *, 5 AS label FROM net_electric_consumption_cost_function
)

SELECT
(s.timestep + ${timezone_offset})*3600 AS timestamp,
AVG(s.value/b.value) AS basic,
AVG(s.value/o.value) AS optimized
FROM c_union s
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = s.environment_id
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT * FROM c_union WHERE environment_id = ${basic_rbc_environment_id}
) b ON b.timestep = s.timestep AND b.label = s.label
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT * FROM c_union WHERE environment_id = ${optimized_rbc_environment_id}
) o ON o.timestep = s.timestep AND o.label = s.label
WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}
GROUP BY
s.timestep,
s.environment_id

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    (t.timestep + ${timezone_offset})*3600 AS timestamp,
    s.electric_consumption_cooling AS cooling,
    s.electric_consumption_dhw AS dhw,
    s.electric_consumption_appliances AS appliances,
    s.electric_consumption_cooling_storage AS cooling_storage,
    s.electric_consumption_dhw_storage AS dhw_storage,
    s.electric_consumption_electric_storage AS electric_storage,
    s.net_electric_consumption AS net,
    (s.net_electric_consumption + s.electric_generation) AS net_without_generation,
    (s.net_electric_consumption + s.electric_generation - 
        (s.electric_consumption_cooling_storage + s.electric_consumption_dhw_storage + s.electric_consumption_electric_storage)
    ) AS net_without_generation_and_storage
FROM environment_timeseries s
LEFT JOIN timestep t ON t.id = s.timestep_id
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = s.environment_id
WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
    (t.timestep + ${timezone_offset})*3600 AS timestamp,
    s.electric_consumption_cooling AS cooling,
    s.electric_consumption_dhw AS dhw,
    s.electric_consumption_appliances AS appliances,
    s.electric_consumption_cooling_storage AS cooling_storage,
    s.electric_consumption_dhw_storage AS dhw_storage,
    s.electric_consumption_electric_storage AS electric_storage,
    s.net_electric_consumption AS net,
    (s.net_electric_consumption + s.electric_generation) AS net_without_generation,
    (s.net_electric_consumption + s.electric_generation - 
        (s.electric_consumption_cooling_storage + s.electric_consumption_dhw_storage + s.electric_consumption_electric_storage)
    ) AS net_without_generation_and_storage
FROM environment_timeseries s
LEFT JOIN timestep t ON t.id = s.timestep_id
LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = s.environment_id
WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}

list.definition: SELECT b.name FROM building b LEFT JOIN environment e ON e.id = b.environment_id WHERE e.simulation_id = ${simulation_id}
list.description: Select building name as it appeared in building_attributes.json
